initial_conversation.content: You are an expert on urban infrastructure.
Propose a very simple strategy for reducing urban traffic congestion using technology and policy interventions.

aggregator_context.content: Your role is to objectively evaluate responses from multiple large-language models and combine them into a single response based on majority.

aggregator_prompt.content: Combine the previously provided responses into a single one based on their common features.

improvement_prompt: Please provide an answer to the initial query based on the aggregated responses provided.
